بڑی کمپنیوں میں عام ایگزیکٹو عہدوں میں س: What is a CHRO in a company? Do large companies have a CHRO position?

A chief human resources officer (CHRO) or chief people officer (CPO) is a corporate officer who oversees all aspects of human resource management and industrial relations policies, practices and operations for an organization.
What is a CHRO in a company? Do large companies have a CHRO position?

CHROs have taken on a powerful position in the C-suite over the past few years. And as they accept more and more business responsibilities, companies are looking to hire heavy-hitters to fill the HR role.
سی ایچ آر او کا مطلب چیف ہیومن ریسورسز آ: سی ایچ آر او کا مطلب کیا ہے؟ CHRO stands for
No good Google Search Result was found
سی ایچ آر او کا مطلب کیا ہے؟ CHRO stands for
The acronym CHRO stands for chief human resources officer. A chief human resources officer, or CHRO, is the C-suite executive responsible for overseeing the human resources team.
